name: react-blazor
description: React vs. Blazor side by side

scripts.build:blazor: dotnet publish src/blazor/BlazorChatApp.csproj -c Release && node blazor-output.js Release
scripts.build:blazor:docker: docker run --rm -v $(pwd)/src/blazor:/app mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:5.0 dotnet publish -c Release app/BlazorChatApp.csproj && node blazor-output.js Release
scripts.build:blazor:docker:win: docker run --rm -v ${pwd}/src/blazor:/app mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:5.0 dotnet publish -c Release app/BlazorChatApp.csproj && node blazor-output.js Release
scripts.build: npm run build:react && npm run build:blazor

author: Boyan Mihaylov
